title: Seldarine Drow
content:
into the Underdark, where they splintered into warring factions. Seldarine drow can be found seeking allies from all over Faerun, aiming to settle their conflict with Lolth - and each other - by any means necessary.

Seldarine Drow Traits:

Darkness: At lvl 5, Seldarine Drows learn this spell.

Base Racial Speed: The distance you can move per turn is 9 m. Fey Ancestry: The Feywild casts a veil over your mind. You have an advantage on saving throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you t
